title.rendered: Top Companies Providing Visa Sponsorship Jobs in Switzerland

content.rendered:
Employers Providing Visa Sponsorship Jobs in Switzerland in 2024: Switzerland has seen an increasing interest from international individuals who wish to study, work, and live in the country, thanks to the numerous benefits it offers. With its strong economy, stunning scenery, and excellent infrastructure, Switzerland is an attractive destination for career opportunities.

The appeal of generous salaries and favourable tax rates in Switzerland has motivated numerous foreign individuals to consider job openings within Swiss firms. Importantly, several well-established companies in Switzerland provide roles that include the prospect of visa sponsorship for talented and capable foreign experts.

Nonetheless, applying for a visa can be demanding and complex for those seeking to relocate to a foreign nation. If you are an expatriate aspiring to relocate to Switzerland for employment, you will typically need a valid work visa. The precise prerequisites can differ based on your country of origin and the role you are pursuing.

Visa Sponsorship Jobs

Employment-based visa sponsorship involves an employer sponsoring a foreign worker for a visa, enabling the individual to work in a foreign country. The employer assumes the responsibility of demonstrating that no qualified local workers are available for the position and supports the foreign worker’s application for immigration benefits.

Hence, employment opportunities that involve an employer sponsoring a foreign worker’s visa for relocation to the country where the job is based are referred to as “Visa Sponsorship Job Offers.” These visas are often extended to skilled workers in high demand in the country where the job is located.

For example, healthcare, engineering, technology, and similar positions frequently offer visa sponsorship. Since these roles often require specialized training and education that may not be readily available in the local labour market, employers opt to sponsor visas for qualified foreign professionals to address this labour shortage.

Companies Offering Visa Sponsorship Jobs in Switzerland

Several companies in Switzerland offer jobs with visa sponsorship to foreign workers from around the globe. The following are companies offering visa sponsorship jobs in Switzerland:

  • GRAPE
  • ALCHEMY
  • EF
  • VERITY
  • HUGO BOSS
  • FFI ADVISORY

GRAPE

This company is known for its commitment to supporting a robust and diverse workforce and engaging the skills of experts globally. GRAPE is a sought-after workplace for local and foreign talent due to its strong and healthy infrastructure and reputation for innovation. There are many benefits for anyone from outside Switzerland who wants to work there.

Job positions at GRAPE:

  • Sales Support
  • Business Development and Sales Internship
  • Claims Manager
  • Senior Underwriter

Benefits:

 In a remote-friendly environment, you can work from home or the office.

  • Offers a worker-friendly compensation package with a competitive salary, various benefits, and stock options.
  • Regular team events and retreats.
  • Sponsorship for work visas and relocation costs
  • Paid vacation per year.

ALCHEMY

This company has a reputation as a progressive institution that values diverse skills. It welcomes foreign specialists by contributing to Switzerland’s dynamic workforce and economic expansion. ALCHEMY goes above and beyond simply recruiting foreign workers and work visas in Switzerland.

Job Offers at ALCHEMY:

  • Director of Operations
  • Senior Relocation Consultant
  • Director of Sales
  • Account Manager, Hospitality
  • Import/Export Air/Ocean Freight Specialist

Benefits:

  • Supportive work environment
  • Worker’s Health Care
  • Good salary

EF

This notable institution offers job opportunities for foreigners looking to work in Switzerland. They specialize in helping foreign professionals with the complexities of obtaining a work permit in Switzerland and have a proven track record of professionalism and expertise. EF provides specialized work visa services.

Work positions at EF:

  • Technology
  • Teaching
  • Marketing
  • Finance, Legal and Business Intelligence
  • Sales
  • General Management
  • Customer Service
  • Creative
  • Operations
  • Faculty & Research
  • Early Career Opportunities
  • Internships
  • Seasonal Opportunities

Benefits:

  • Life and health insurance
  • Professional development, such as monthly training, workshops, and motivational presentations.
  • First year: nine paid holidays and four weeks of paid vacation.
  • 25% match from the firm for your 401(k)
  • Annual fitness reimbursement, as well as wellness benefits
  • Discounts offered through the EF program on travel, daycare, and more
  • Flexible spending accounts (FSAs) for commuters, dependent care, and healthcare

VERITY

By embracing foreign professionals, this company has positioned and distinguished itself as a pioneer in developing a diverse and inclusive workforce using foreign expatriates’ services. With its innovative and expansion policy, VERITY offers opportunities for international talent to contribute to Switzerland’s thriving economic environment and create jobs for foreigners.

Jobs at VERITY:

  • Senior Software Engineer
  • Embedded Software Engineer
  • IT Systems Engineer Logistics Lead
  • Software Tools Internship (6+ Months)

Benefits:

  • Flexibility of a hybrid work environment.
  • Annual team-building events
  • 25 days of annual leave, employee stock ownership plan (conditions apply), variety of pension plans, and relocation packages
  • Conducive office space for efficiency at work

Hugo Boss

Hugo Boss is a brand associated with elegant style and international sophistication. Its penchant for excellence is evident in its ability to absorb foreign workers into its ranks. HUGO BOSS supports Switzerland’s expanding economy and international outlook by tapping international talents.

Job positions at HUGO BOSS:
  • Full-Time Sales Associate
  • Assistant Store Manager
  • Full-Time Key Holder
  • Assistant Shop Manager

Benefits:

  • Base Pay + Commission
  • Earned Vacation and Sick time
  • Excellent health care, dental, and vision.

FFI ADVISORY

This company is well known for its dedication to developing a diverse and inclusive workforce, including having foreign professionals in its employ. FFI ADVISORY has a solid reputation for offering professional advice and appreciating the importance of global viewpoints and knowledge. The recruiting strategy of FFI ADVISORY goes beyond recruitment and includes strong support.

Categories of Job Sponsorship Visas at FFI Advisory:

  • Senior SAP Cloud Integration Consultant
  • SAP Solution Architect
  • Senior SAP Business Analyst

Benefits:

  • Attractive employment conditions with good social benefits
  • Central Workplace in New Office Building (Glatt Tower)
  • Offers employees the opportunity to work on cutting-edge projects to shape the future of businesses in Switzerland.
